Room.Name: Delaney Drive/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Delaney Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Delaney Drive running north and south, is intersected by Darmanian Way, running east and west at this point. The Oceancrest Municiple Library is located on the northeast corner of the intersection, and the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss is located on the southeast. A number of shops are on the southwest corner and the Oceancrest North City Guard Barracks are located on the northwest corner.
